about_the_game:
This free fan kit art bundle includes a collection of pieces of art, music tracks, wallpapers and more. It’s a small token of our appreciation of your continued support and passion for Book of Travels, and something to hold you over while you wait for the next big in-game content drop.

Once you downloaded the DLC, to find the files on your computer follow these steps:

1) Go to your Steam Library and right click on Book of Travels in the list.
2) Select Manage
3) Select Browse Local Files
4) You should see 2 folders:
– Anniversary Bundle Art
– Anniversary Bundle MP3

1 Year EA Anniversary Digital Goodies contains:

2 BoT Cover images, Digital art (HD):
The First Cover.png
The Second Cover.png

3 Hand painted Forms, Digital Art (HD)The Crested.png
The Goodward.png
The Veiled.png

4 Hand painted Digital Art (HD):
Kettem Rajh.png
Kettem.png
Maisu.png
Saida the Sea Fury.png

1 Timelapse video:
Painting Ketten Rajh.mp4

Music:
Two free songs from the Soundtrack as MP3:s:
Paths (Main Theme).mp3
The Elden Road.mp3

1 Map:
A new map of Braided Shore (Updated artwork, HD)

Wallpapers for desktop and smartphones
A selection of beautiful and hand painted art from the world of Book of Travels: Maps, art with forms and creatures you can play or meet in the game, items, clothes, food and much, much more:
14 x 1080 x 1920 (smartphone)
7 x 1920 x 1080 (desktop)
7 x 1920 x 1080 (desktop)
5 x 1920 x 1200 (desktop)
6 x 2160 x 1920 (desktop)

legal_notice:
Free digital goodies to celebrate 1 year in Early Access.
for more info: contact: contact@mightanddelight.com

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5500M 8GB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Book of Travels – 1 Year EA Anniversary Digital Goodies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780, Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

It’s a small token of our appreciation of your continued support and passion for Book of Travels, and something to hold you over while you wait for the next big in-game content drop.
